page.title: 02Local Celebrity Interview
page.content: Norman Thomas is a D.J. with local radio. 1{What do you like about living in {Rainford?} I like living in Rainford because it's a small village and the people are very friendly. 2{Why did you leave teaching to become {a D.J.?} I left teaching because I was doing a lot of radio work for schools as well as doing my teaching. 3{Does your job ever bore you?} Yes,because I have to do the same thing every day. 4{Do you get to meet many famous {people?} Yes I have met Elton John,Paul McCartney,Prince Charles and lots more 5{What is your preference in music? I prefer musicals like Barnum,Annie and 42nd Street,which I can relax to.
